actionCalls.name: Send_Notification_Approve_Send_to_SAP
actionCalls.label: Send Notification Approve Send to SAP

actionCalls.name: Send_Notification_Reject_Send_to_SAP
actionCalls.label: Send Notification Reject Send to SAP

actionCalls.name: Send_Notification_Reject_Send_to_SAP_Trader
actionCalls.label: Send Notification Reject Send to SAP Trader

Flow.description: [26-Jun-2024] - Edit condition for getting TRCR from metadata (Element: getTRCRApproveCommittee_0). - Edit condition for getting FALB from metadata (Element: getFALBApproveCommittee_0). - Edit condition for getting TRCR from metadata (Element: getTRCRREJCommittee_0). - Edit condition for getting FALB from metadata (Element: getFALBREJCommittee_0). - Edit condition for getting TRCR from metadata (Element: getTRCRSummaryReport). - Edit condition for getting CMVP from metadata (Element: getCMVPSummaryReport). - Edit condition for getting FALB from metadata (Element: getFALBSummaryReport_0). - Edit condition for getting LABIX MD from metadata (Element: getLABIXMDSummaryReport). - Edit condition for getting TXFA from metadata (Element: getTXFASummaryReport). - Edit condition for getting TXMD from metadata (Element: getTXMDSummaryReport). - Edit condition for getting DMD from metadata (Element: getDMDSummaryReport). - Edit condition for getting TSR president from metadata (Element: getTSRPresidentSummaryReport). - Edit condition for getting JSKem owner from metadata (Element: getJSKemOwnerSummaryReport). - Edit condition for getting TXINDIA MD from metadata (Element: getTXIndiaMDSummaryReport). - Edit condition for getting operation from metadata (Element: getOperation_EmailToCustomer). - Edit condition for getting operation from metadata (Element: getOperation_EmailToSupplier). - Edit condition for getting TRCR from metadata (Element: getTRCRMetadata_ApprovedEditCounterparty). - Edit condition for getting LABIX from metadata (Element: getFALBMetadata_ApprovedEditCounterparty). - Edit condition for getting TRCR from metadata (Element: getTRCRMetadata_RejectedEditCounterparty). - Edit condition for getting FALB from metadata (Element: getFALBMetadata_RejectedEditCounterparty). 03-Jul- 2024 - Add check MDC and assign MDC in "S/H Approved Edit Process" decision. - Move assign trader after assign MDC in "S/H Approved Edit Process" decision.

formulas.name: fmlEditCounterpartyNotifyBody_Approved
formulas.expression: {!$Record.Customer__r.Name} & " Edit Counterparty Information has been approved by " & {!$Record.fmlPositionNameOfFinancial__c} & " Section Head. Please proceed next step."

formulas.name: fmlEditCounterpartyNotifyBody_Rejected
formulas.expression: {!$Record.Customer__r.Name} & " Edit Counterparty Information has been rejected by " & {!$Record.fmlPositionNameOfFinancial__c} & " Section Head. Please revise and proceed next step."

formulas.name: fmlNotifyApproveSendtoSAPBody
formulas.expression: {!$Record.fmlAccountTypeName__c} & " Information has been approved by Master Data Controller Manager. Please send information to " & {!$Record.fmlTXSystemName__c} & "."

formulas.name: fmlNotifyAprbyCommitteeTitle
formulas.expression: "Change credit condition request has been approved!"

formulas.name: fmlNotifyMDCBody
formulas.expression: {!$Record.fmlAccountTypeName__c} & " Information is ready. Please review and submit for approval by Master Data Controller Manager."

formulas.name: fmlNotifyOperationBody_EmailToCustomer
formulas.expression: {!$Record.CTRRequestFormHeader__r.Customer__r.Name} & " has been approved. Please kindly review and submit SAP Information."

formulas.name: fmlNotifyOperationBody_EmailToSupplier
formulas.expression: {!$Record.CTRRequestFormHeader__r.Customer__r.Name} & " has been approved. Please kindly review and submit SAP Information."

formulas.name: fmlNotifyREJbyCommitteeTitle
formulas.expression: "Change credit condition request has been rejected!"

formulas.name: fmlNotifyRejectSendtoSAPBody
formulas.expression: {!$Record.fmlAccountTypeName__c} & " Information has been rejected by Master Data Controller Manager. Please revise and re-submit request."

formulas.name: fmlNotifyRejectSendtoSAPTraderBody
formulas.expression: {!$Record.CTRRequestFormHeader__r.Customer__r.Name} & " Information has been rejected by Master Data Controller Manager. Please revise and proceed next step."

formulas.name: fmlNotifyShiptoBodytoMDC
formulas.expression: {!$Record.Customer__r.Name} & " Ship-to Information has been approved by Trader Section Head Please review and submit for approval ship-to master to SAP."

formulas.name: fmlNotifyTraderApprovedEditProcessBody
formulas.expression: "The request to edit " & {!fmlAccountTypeNameEditProcess} & " information has been approved by the Section Head."

formulas.name: fmlNotifyTraderApprovedEditProcessTitle
formulas.expression: {!$Record.CompanyNameSubject__c} & "'s" & " request to edit " & {!fmlAccountTypeNameEditProcess} & " information has been approved."

formulas.name: fmlNotifyTraderRejectedEditProcessBody
formulas.expression: "The request to edit " & {!fmlAccountTypeNameEditProcess} & " information has been rejected by the Section Head."

formulas.name: fmlNotifyTraderRejectedEditProcessTitle
formulas.expression: {!$Record.CompanyNameSubject__c} & "'s" & " request to edit " & {!fmlAccountTypeNameEditProcess} & " information has been rejected."

formulas.name: fmlOperationEmailSubject_EmailToCustomer
formulas.expression: '[FYA][' + {!$Record.SubBU__c} + ']: Request for Review of Customer Information : ' + {!$Record.CTRRequestFormHeader__r.Customer__r.Name}

formulas.name: fmlOperationEmailSubject_EmailToSupplier
formulas.expression: '[FYA][' + {!$Record.SubBU__c} + ']: Request for Review of Supplier Information : ' + {!$Record.CTRRequestFormHeader__r.Customer__r.Name}

Flow.label: CTRTriggerRequestItemNotifyCustom

recordLookups.name: getCMVPSummaryReport
recordLookups.label: getCMVPSummaryReport
recordLookups.filterLogic: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 AND( 6 OR 7)

textTemplates.name: bodyMDCEmail
textTemplates.text:
Dear {!$Record.MDCName__r.FirstName} {!$Record.MDCName__r.LastName},

Please review the {!$Record.fmlTXSystemName__c} information and submit for approval, proceed via this link.

Company Name: {!$Record.CTRRequestFormHeader__r.Customer__r.Name}

Interested to be: {!$Record.fmlAccountTypeName__c}

Product Name: {!$Record.ProductName__c}

Requester Name: {!$Record.Owner:User.FirstName} {!$Record.Owner:User.LastName}


Best Regards,
Counterparties Registration Automated System
This is an automatic generated email. Please do not reply to this address.

textTemplates.name: bodyOperationEmail_EmailToCustomer
textTemplates.text:
Dear Operation Team,


Please review customer information for {!$Record.CTRRequestFormHeader__r.Customer__r.Name} this is ready to be entered into SAP


Company Name: {!$Record.CTRRequestFormHeader__r.Customer__r.Name}

Interested to be: {!$Record.fmlAccountTypeName__c} {!$Flow}

Product Name: {!$Record.ProductName__c}

Credit Condition: {!$Record.FinCrCond__c} : {!$Record.FinPaymentCond__c}


Please proceed via this link.


Best Regards,

Counterparties Registration Automated System

This is an automatic generated email. Please do not reply to this address.

textTemplates.name: bodyOperationEmail_EmailToSupplier
textTemplates.text:
Dear Operation Team,


Please review supplier information for {!$Record.CTRRequestFormHeader__r.Customer__r.Name} this is ready to be entered into SAP


Company Name: {!$Record.CTRRequestFormHeader__r.Customer__r.Name}

Interested to be: {!$Record.fmlAccountTypeName__c} {!$Flow}

Product Name: {!$Record.ProductName__c}

Credit Condition: {!$Record.FinCrCond__c} : {!$Record.FinPaymentCond__c}


Please proceed via this link.


Best Regards,

Counterparties Registration Automated System

This is an automatic generated email. Please do not reply to this address.
